data.title: Top Right Group to combine EMAP and 4C
data.meta_description: EMAP brands Health Service Journal, MEED, Nursing Times and Retail Week will begin a phased programme to become events and digital-only as Top Right Group is set to merge 4C, Planet Retail/Retail Net Group (RNG), and EMAP. As a result of …
